name: Pipe Panic (wafflekiller5876)
description:
Submission to the Auburn Game Jam 2023

You are a landlord and must fix your freezing pipes! But watch out... There seems to be a lurking enemy. The enemy is frozen in place until it is seen.

Controls:

wasd to move

q to quit

e to interact (doors and pipes)

shift to TOGGLE sprint

Credit to urmomsfacesmom and pancakejr for the ideas.
